subtasks: Approach the stack of hay
Grip the hay bale and place it onto the trailer
Secure the bale on the trailer with rope or bale nets to prevent tipping
Repeat for other bales

tasks.task: Driving a farm vehicle (truck) with a trailer
subtasks: Seatbelt on
Adjust seat and mirrors for visibility
Check trailer connections (lights, brakes)
Start the vehicle and proceed to the hay field or storage area
Wait until the trailer is loaded to capacity
Position the trailer near the storage location or barn
Loosen the securing rope or bale net attachments
Guide the bales off the trailer, ensuring stability

tasks.task: Stacking hay in a barn or storage area
subtasks: Clear a path or designated area for hay stacking
Inspect stacking area for safety (no protruding nails, flat ground)
Stack hay bales neatly, possibly in a pyramid shape for stability
Cover the stack with a tarp to protect from weather

tasks.task: Horse handling tasks at a farm
subtasks: Tackling a horse (preparing the saddle)
Wearing appropriate riding gear and establishing rapport with the horse
Mounting the horse safely and securely
Taking the horse out for a ride or exercise
